title: Large 615 sqft 1 bed, 1 bath! Convenient washer and dryer included!

beautifully appointed.', 'Each kitchen is fully equipped with microwave oven, frost-free refrigerator, dishwasher and disposal.', "You'll also enjoy the luxury of having both a washer and dryer inside community features four refreshing swimming pools and control-access entry systems.', 'As a resident you will appreciate the professional and experienced on-site management and maintenance staff who
